subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: If Philadelphia beats Boston in Game 7 on Friday, it will become the first N.H.L. team since the 1975 Islanders to come back from a three-game deficit.
snippet: If Philadelphia beats Boston in Game 7 on Friday, it will become the first N.H.L. team since the 1975 Islanders to come back from a three-game deficit.
